button.name: button_submit
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to Submit
button.help: This submits the form to admin supervisor or functional manager

button.name: button_admin_supervisor_rating
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to Submit rating
button.help: Done by the Admin supervisor: This submits the admin rating to the functional manager

button.name: button_functional_manager_rating
button.help: Done by the Functional manager: This submits the admin rating to the employee's reviewer
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to Submit rating

button.name: button_reviewer_manager_rating
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to Submit rating
button.help: Done by the reviewer: This is the final process that determines the overall score

button.name: button_withdraw
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to Withdraw

button.name: button_set_to_draft
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to continue?

page.name: instruction_page
page.p: * All Appraisees should rate the min - max of 5 - 20 on KRA / Achievement.
* Kindly read instruction before rating on each line.

separator.string: Appraisee’s Personal Information (employee must have worked for minimum 6 months in the appraisal period)
Current Functional Appraiser’s (should have supervised appraisee for minimum 3 months) Personal Information
Current Administrative Appraiser’s (should have supervised appraisee for minimum 3 months) Personal Information
Current Reviewer’s (the supervisor of the current Functional Appraiser) Personal Information

page.name: section_line_ids
page.p: * Minimum of 5 lines and Maximun of 7 Lines to be added on this section
* Instructions: KRA / Achievement Ratings - Please use the following Rating Guidelines (1 to 4 scale, where 4 is the HIGHEST rating)
* Instructions: Functional Competencies Ratings: Please TICK the most appropriate column using the following Rating Guidelines (1 to 5 scale, where 5 is the HIGHEST rating)
* Instructions: Leadership Competency Ratings: Please use the following Rating Guidelines (1 to 5 scale). All LC have equal weightage

separator.string: Training Need Identification (to be filled by the CURRENT APPRAISER)

page.p: * At least 1 should be related to functional competency and 1 should be related to general topic or leadership competency
* Instruction: Appraisee to be rated by the Current Appraisee's and review officer

tr.th:
Performance is well below standard.
Whether the person can improve to meet
the minimum standard is questionable

Performance & Competence is below the
expected standards. However, potential to
improve within a reasonable time frame is
evident. Not someone, whose attrition bothers
company

Performance & Competence is largely
meeting expected standards. This level is
what satisfies the bosses / company to retain
the talent even if it needs extra walking
in normal circumstances

The person is so successful at his/her job
& competencies criteria that special note
should be made, and performance ranks in
the top percentile. A top talent, someone
to be retained at any cost!

page.p: * Instruction It's majorly about the 'future', not the past performance

tr.th: Potential in current job is below expectation; needs more development & dedication
Shows good potential in current job, but needs more development & grooming for future / higher roles.
Shows high proficiency in current job(s); and is capable of handling higher/future role with guidance
Has overgrown current role, and is fully potent to take up higher/future role

page.p: * Instruction Quality checks & due diligence to be done by the HR Team
